item.title: /About CERI
item.description: CERI is devoted to helping institutions and governments improve social policy. We work with executive boards, organizational leaders, and other data-driven entities to fill information gaps and solve complex problems. To achieve our goals, we build diverse research teams with a global reach. Depending on the task, our teams may include open source specialists; public policy experts; financial analysts, media and public relations specialists; marketing professionals; business and not-for-profit leaders; academics; and experts in social media analysis; as well as former elected officials, investigative journalists, government investigators, and intelligence professionals.

item.title: /Issues
item.description: CERI is committed to improving social policy across the board. There is no problem to small or too large for our firm. We work in education from preschool to postsecondary covering all branches and pathways that intersect this field. If it effects the lives of people, we can help.

item.title: /Populations
item.description: CERI is invested to learn and grow with all populations to improve their lives or lives they may influence. We work with individuals, families, and children.

item.title: /Questions
item.description: In order to provide the best solution we begin by asking and forming the right questions. Through a partnerships and relationships, we make sure to collaborate and focus on the questions that matter most to policymakers and practitioners.
